tutors.teachingStyleAndExperience: I focus on personalized learning, ensuring students grasp concepts through examples and practice.

example.name: american
example.description: a flexible education system from the united states that focuses on continuous assessment, creativity, and extracurricular development, typically following a kâ€“12 structure.

example.name: british
example.description: an education system based on the uk curriculum, emphasizing critical thinking, broad subject exposure, and structured assessment through stages like key stages, gcses, and a-levels.

example.name: english
example.description: builds communication skills in reading, writing, speaking, and comprehension, while also enhancing grammar and vocabulary.

example.name: languages (french)
example.description: introduces students to basic french communication skills in speaking, reading, and writing, promoting multilingualism and global exposure.

example.name: jss 1
example.description: the first stage of junior secondary education, introducing subjects like basic science, technology, and business studies to broaden understanding.

example.name: jss 2
example.description: builds on jss 1 with more complex concepts in core subjects and early exposure to career-related topics.
